example.description: This example creates an IAM OIDC provider associated with the OIDC compatible provider service found at the URL https://example.oidcprovider.com and the client ID my-testapp-1. The OIDC provider supplies the thumbprint. To authenticate the thumbprint, follow the steps at http://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/identity-providers-oidc-obtain-thumbprint.html.
